message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.  Let me know what you think!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $12,500?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I'm willing to negotiate, $12,500 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $13,500? This product would really benefit you, and I'm offering a fair price.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget
